name: Quaduino
body:
# Quaduino
***

This is the code of a quadcopter, and its RemoteController.
I develope those during my homebrew quadcopter build.
Both of the on board and hand-held controllers use Arduino Uno Board as controller.

Setting of the quad is + mode and use PID controller for Pitch,Roll angular rate control.
And a PD controller for Pitch,Roll angular position control.

This code should work on any hardware, only needed is arduino, modules, and some tweaking about PID gain.

## List of modules I am using:
...nRf24L01+
...MPU6500
  
## List of Library I am using:
...RF24 -- https://github.com/maniacbug/RF24
...i2cdevlib -- https://github.com/jrowberg/i2cdevlib/tree/master/Arduino/MPU6050
